scripts.reset-db: cd ../backend/ && . env/bin/activate && tracimcli db delete --force -c ./cypress_test.ini && tracimcli db init -c ./cypress_test.ini && cp /tmp/tracim_cypress.sqlite /tmp/tracim_cypress.sqlite.tmp && cd -
scripts.travis-cypress-run: cd ../backend/ && tracimcli db delete --force -c ./cypress_test.ini && tracimcli db init -c ./cypress_test.ini && ls -la && cp /tmp/tracim_cypress.sqlite /tmp/tracim_cypress.sqlite.tmp && cd - && node_modules/cypress/bin/cypress run
